title: HI, HOW ARE YOU?
description: A short film about time, repetition, and memory, shot within 30 minutes. This player is part of the work—not a wrapper around it. It treats viewing as an act of co‑composition: the film loops, the interface listens, and the audience shapes tempo.

title: I'm Labels (?)
description: A work that attempts to explore the notion of 'labels' as a form of identity, a minimalist, scroll-driven typographic autobiographical story.

title: ProgDoze
description: A drifting collage of progressive rock fragments — iconic cover art silhouettes ripple across the screen while curated song clips fade in and out like memories from a cosmic cassette.

title: Dream or Sketch
description: An interactive meta-comic about looping dreams and false awakenings. Advance the story by clicking hotspots to explore seven dream stages. The comic is aware of its own surreal, repetitive structure.

title: Kitchen Chaos
description: A minimal, abstract animation about the chaos of a kitchen. An everyday kitchen slips from calm preparation into escalating mishaps and, finally, full chaos. You conduct the narrative with simple gestures, and the world answers in sound and playful, candy‑pastel visuals.

title: Scavenger Hunt
description: An interactive scavenger hunt set in a retro-realistic-futuristic world. Play as Agent 734, using video feeds and terminal commands to explore a campus and complete your mission.
